cards.title: Win Back Time
cards.body: Stop wasting valuable hours navigating disconnected information silos.

cards.title: Streamline Your Work
cards.body: Connect tools from different providers with each other and standardize work processes.

cards.title: Filter Out Noise
cards.body: Search centrally across silos, set filters to focus on what is actually relevant.

cards.title: Increased Productivity
cards.body: Stop your team from wasting valuable hours navigating disconnected information silos.

cards.title: One Home for your team
cards.body: Customize the interface and make ita user’s only web contact point [OPTIONAL].

cards.title: Central Access Managemen
cards.body: Provide, monitor or revoke a user’s access to the different cloud apps in one step.
